div.div: Patterns of spatial density dependence among trees at each site.
div.p: Significance levels are indicated by superscripts as follows: ns non significant; * p<0.05, ** p<0.01, *** p<0.001. p = 0.05 is equivalent to p = 0.017 after Dunn-Šidàk adjustment ( Table 2). Note that the scale of the y-axis is different in for Dunrobin (h).
